text: Jack "Jackie" Dryburgh (14 January 1939 - 21 August 2020) was a British ice hockey player and coach and administrator. He played for many clubs in Scotland and England during the 1950s and 1960s as well as coaching in Aviemore and Solihull. He was a member of the British Ice Hockey Association. She was added into the British Ice Hockey Hall of Fame in 1991. ==References== ==Other websites== *A to Z Encyclopaedia of Ice Hockey entry *British Ice Hockey Hall of Fame entry Category:1939 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Scottish ice hockey players Category:Sportspeople from Fife
title: Jack Dryburgh
